column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. khufayfun li’abī bikrun bn al-qbṭūrnh
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. qaṣīdah. munsariḥ
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. tawshīḥ hazaj

column2: subḥān al-lah mā abda‘ al-shumūs ḥīn takhfaq
idhā kannat dhā ‘ishqun w wajdun w riqqah ‘alayk biruṣṣad al-dhayl kann bih munshidan

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. tawshīḥ lābin baqqī

column2: man yaqul lak man huw fī ‘ishqak mu‘adhdhab
kās gharāmak fī famī aḥlá wa’aṭyab
jamī‘ al-nās qad ḥāzūā fī al-ḥubb madhhab

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. qaṣīdah. munsariḥ
al-ṣan‘ah. raṣd al-dhayl. tawshīḥ lābin sahil
